name: @tibiarise/cron
description: Standalone cron service for TibiaRise data management

scripts.dev: if [ -f .env ]; then dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/index.ts; else tsx src/index.ts; fi
scripts.seed: if [ -f .env ]; then dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/seed-experience.ts; else tsx src/seed-experience.ts; fi
scripts.deduplicate: if [ -f .env ]; then dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/deduplicate-characters.ts; else tsx src/deduplicate-characters.ts; fi
scripts.cleanup: if [ -f .env ]; then dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/delete-old-experience.ts; else tsx src/delete-old-experience.ts; fi
